TopicTitle: [WIP] [0.24] Crowd-sourced Story Logs: Contracts Need you!

will not contine with this and thread is locked. Please use coherent contracts:)

Comment on the link and hope that I will see and add

Helpfull

Edited August 11, 2014 by Joshwoo69
coherent contracts re-update!

NICE!

I don't know if contracts will become like science, boring and repetitive, but if yes, this mod is the perfect alternative!

Umm, "this mod" and that configfile do not change contracts! It only changes the DESCRIPTION of contracts. So, what "this mod" could do is avoid repetitive contract descriptions - it cannot change the gamemechanics of contracts without a plugin.
I love this! can we create new unique missions with unique requirements? also: is it possible to create missions for mods (ie a kethane mining mission, or map sat, station parts.)

As my post above yours said:

NO! Unless you can program C#.
The text in contracts is already randomized. If in fact so randomized that it can be hard to read so I doubt people will even bother to read them

I love this! can we create new unique missions with unique requirements? also: is it possible to create missions for mods (ie a kethane mining mission, or map sat, station parts.)

No it only modifies stock and you cannot add new ones if I am right...

[MOD - Moved to Add-on Development, as that is where calls for collaboration should go.

The releases subforum is only for completed projects, or projects with actual downloadable content.]

Hi guys,

Just turned this up in a forum search, and was wondering how you were getting on.

There's probably going to be a fair bit of cross-over with Coherent Contracts. Fancy doing a bit of collaboration?

Hi guys,

Just turned this up in a forum search, and was wondering how you were getting on.

There's probably going to be a fair bit of cross-over with Coherent Contracts. Fancy doing a bit of collaboration?

Sure! Go ahead!

Uh can also help me moderate the drive thing / combing both?

Sure! Go ahead!

Uh can also help me moderate the drive thing / combing both?

Yep, how exactly are you doing the crowdsourcing? Are you just letting people edit the .cfg? Has there been much activity so far?

Not much.... letting them comment and the I edit.

Oh, I am able to put you where you could edit too!

If at all possible you should come up with a module manager config for this rather than directly editing and replacing stock Squad files. Replacing stock files is always a bad idea and seems to have led to many of the problems that people had with crowd sourced science logs.

The contract storydefs file seems to use the same basic kind of config node structure that the sciencedefs file uses, so it shouldn't be difficult to do this with module manager.
Honestly, if you want any sort of crowd participation, you need to get this to addon releases. Addon development is like the addons hipster cousin

Honestly, if you want any sort of crowd participation, you need to get this to addon releases. Addon development is like the addons hipster cousin

On the contrary, I moved it to Add-on Development because there wasn't anything usable to download and it was merely a call for people to write configs for Joshwoo to re-bundle.

If I want to make it a module manager thing, then I would ask for assistance (I am bad at coding module manager stuff)@Dmagic do you know how to do the module manager thing?

Edited July 23, 2014 by Joshwoo69
dmagic orbit stuff
